User Story Description: As a doctor, I want to upload medical images so that the AI can enhance and process them.
As an AI engineer, I want to integrate the image enhancement model so that doctors receive clearer visual outputs.
As a clinician, I want to enter patient clinical notes so that the AI can generate structured medical summaries.
As an AI developer, I want the system to automatically generate ICD-10 codes so that diagnoses are standardized.
As a UI/UX designer, I want to create a clean and simple interface so that doctors can easily use the system.
As a backend engineer, I want to build API endpoints for image enhancement, report generation, and ICD-10 inference.
As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the entire application online so that it can be accessed from any device.
As a QA tester, I want to validate all modules so that the system is reliable and error-free.
As a technical writer, I want to prepare complete project documentation so that stakeholders can understand the system.
